data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This is an interactive lesson where your goal is to select the picture that matches the phrase at the top of the screen. If ____ click ____ the ____ picture ____ will ____ out ____ you ____ click ____ to ____ another ____. If you want to start the lesson over just reload the page.
data.partBlankContent: This is an interactive lesson where your goal is to select the picture that matches the phrase at the top of the screen. If y__ click o_ the wr___ picture i_ will gr__ out a__ you c__ click ag___ to cho___ another pic____. If you want to start the lesson over just reload the page.
data.fullContent: This is an interactive lesson where your goal is to select the picture that matches the phrase at the top of the screen. If you click on the wrong picture it will gray out and you can click again to choose another picture. If you want to start the lesson over just reload the page.
data.answer: 这是一门互动课程，你的目标是选择与屏幕顶部短语相匹配的图片。如果你点击了错误的图片，它会变灰，你可以再次点击选择另一张图片。如果你想重新开始课程，只要重新加载页面。
